rules_text:
Indestructible
As long as your party isn’t full, Odin, Far-Sighted isn’t a creature. [i](Your party consists of up to one of each of Cleric, Rogue, Warrior, and Wizard.)[/i]
Whenever you roll 10 or greater on a D20, draw a card.
{2}{U}, Exile an instant or sorcery card from your graveyard: Exile target creature you control, return that creature to the battlefield at the beginning of the next end step.
